properties.description: Open every Tuesday evening from 5pm - 8pm until end of March 2023. There is no need to book. Just turn up during this time and receive a warm welcome in a warm space. hours._text: Open every Tuesday evening from 5pm - 8pm until end of March 2023. There is no need to book. Just turn up during this time and receive a warm welcome in a warm space. We will have our heating on, hot drinks at the ready, a hot meal for you to have and board games to play if you wish. Free wifi and power sockets for charging devices if needed.

properties.title: Oak Community Church

properties.address: Station Road, , BR6 0RZ
properties.description: Until the end of March 2023 - Wednesday and Thursday 9.30am – 3.30pm. Free light refreshments, free wifi, free space to work or relax. Until end of Easter 2023 - also on Saturdays, "The Lounge" is open 10am-2pm at the Church. The Lounge is free of charge for those in need. We warmly invite you to join us for a hot meal, refreshments, a warm space and some social activities. Get a hot shower; charge your mobile phone; use our computers; enjoy card games, board games and crafts. Familes and individuals - all welcome. Entrance is on The Drive. Bus routes nearby: 51, 358, 684, B14, R!, R3, R4, $5, R6, R8, R9, R10. Nearest station: Orpington. We have a small car park but may be busy.
